page.title: 10APLEY HOME FARM,STOCKTON.
page.content: THIS IS A TENANT FARM OF 42 FIELDS COVERING 34O HA AND IS MANAGED BY MR.R.PIM.THE FARM WAS ESTABLISEHD IN 1875 WHEN THE FARM BUILDINGS AND THE 14 COTTAGES WERE BUILT.THE FARM EMPLOYS 6 MEN AND IS HIGHLY MECHANISD,WITH 8 TRACTORS, A COMBINE HARVESTER,POTATO HARVESTER AND VARIOUS PLOUGHS AND CULTIVATING EUIPMENT. THE MAIN FARM PRODUCTS ARE WHEAT, BARLEY, POTATOES,SUGAR BEET, FAT CATTLE AND FAT LAMBS.THERE ARE 35O CROSSBRED EWES (SCOTCH HALF BRED,SUFFOLK,&TEXEL SHEEP) & 2 SUFFOLK RAMS.THESE ARE KEPT FOR FAT LAMBS (WHICH SOLD AS DEADWEIGHT OR AT LOCAL MARKETS) & FOR WOOL. THE CATTLE HERD CONSISTS OF 14O HEREFORD & CHAROLLAIS CROSS COWS PLUS 2 CHAROLLAIS BULLS.
